document_title: Endocrine melasma: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: Dark skin types are more susceptible to melasma than light skin types, common in light brown skin types.; Females are 9 times more likely to have melasma than males. It is rare before puberty but common during reproductive age.; Melasma can appear in about 15% - 50% of pregnant people.; People with hormonal disorders.
subsection_title: nam noi tiet.json. Who is susceptible to melasma?
subsection_data:
nam noi tiet.json. Who is susceptible to melasma?
Dark skin types are more susceptible to melasma than light skin types, common in light brown skin types.; Females are 9 times more likely to have melasma than males. It is rare before puberty but common during reproductive age.; Melasma can appear in about 15% - 50% of pregnant people.; People with hormonal disorders.
